Of course, when it comes to reading the content on other peoples’ sites, it’s easy to rationalize why it’s so often ignored.
It doesn’t help me solve my problem. It simply gets in the way.
I don’t have the time or patience. It’s too long to read.
The fact that stakeholders’ don’t typically read all of what’s written on other (similar) sites is reason enough to question writing more than what’s needed.
